titleStmt.title: To His Most Excellent Maiestie King Charles the Second our Most Gracious Soveraign the humble address of the officers of the severall regiments of horse under the command of His Excellency the Lord General Monck, as it was presented by them to His Majestie at Dartford Heath in Kent this present Tuesday, May 29, 1660.
titleStmt.author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Griffin for John Playford ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
